dcterms:description: A multi-modal dataset for autonomous driving that includes 1,000 driving sequences collected in two cities (Boston and Singapore) with an area coverage of about 5 kmÂ², providing diverse weather and illumination conditions.

dcterms:description: An extension of the original Argoverse dataset, Argoverse 2 is larger and collected from 6 U.S. cities, comprising 1,000 annotated driving sequences with a focus on drivable area, road boundaries, lane dividers, and pedestrian crossings.
dcterms:title: Argoverse 2
